content.detailedDescription:
Hanging with my brother leaning on our mothers car at about 1:30 or 2:00 in the am we both simultaneously noticed a light shoot fairly quickly up from the south .At first i though a firework or something but then it hovered in what appeared to be one spot so we tried to put some logic to it,maybe a helicopter ,maybe a flare and at some point not long ( maybe 7 mins after we first noticed it)we realized it was getting closer.At this point it was a fainter light but clearly visible .This light really had our attention and for some reason i knew it was different than any other airship/plane i've ever witnessed and ive lived quite a while right next to selfridge air force base with  large helicopters ,jets and cargo planes around all the time.Roseville where the sighting occurred is only 5 miles away.Anyway we observed the object head slowly( about walking speed) toward us and then over our heads less than 500ft ,it was completely silent the whole time until we were directly under the center of it and than we could hear albeit very low/quiet thrust type noise,the craft was green with some small red accents ( almost like soviet green and red .The craft had one small blinking light and it hadn't any windows but had a sort of protrusion like you would see on a zepplin .When finally passed us we could see the light coming from the rear from flame type aura thruster which encompassed the the whole of the rear of the craft , you could see everything and we had time to get a good look,the craft seemed to be put together like the space shuttle -green tile like large plates ,here's the thing it seemed like something i would say could be man made except for the facts- the thing was 1000 feet (thousand) long or longer -( it was like a icbm (missile )with 3 stubby fins in the rear which was observed as it left our site)
the thing was completely silent until we were directly under the center of the craft and even that sound only lasted a few seconds.
it was so big and slow it should have fell out of the sky. 
we called the police and they said no one else had called about it, it flew over a major interstate and a very populated area( how could no one else see it?(my brother thinks we only saw a part of it and that maybe it's cloaking device was not properly working) 
i think it's man made alien technology, reversed engineered if you will but why such a larg craft, anyway the craft stayed on the same path and headed northwest toward canada ,it had to have been seen by selfridge ang .It kept its same speed and silently went its way.Its the real deal and i haven't seen anything on any show or book yet .Closest thing is a cigar shaped craft but this is different( i've been researching this ever since ) i've submitted this story to some suite years ago but this is as real as it gets and want people to know if our goverment has alien or future human technology.
thanks you
content.summary: My brother and i witnessed a light shoot up and appear to hover only it was on a slow path straight above our heads

content.detailedDescription:
This took place in newtown, ct where i grew up. around may 6 1976, my brother and i stayed outside and saw a light i pointed out in the sky to the north or southeast. before we knew it, it had zipped from a star to hovering over our road. it took a turn above the driveway and i noticed it's illumination onto the gravel below. it was the size of a small car but a sphere glowing from red to orange, then to white. it made no sound and seemed to be a sphere of pure light with what seemed like craters. we ran to the door which was locked and after banging my mom let us in and said she didn't lock it and reported us being gone for a while. 

penniston and burroughs from bentwaters, england reported the same but penniston described it differently than burroughs like my brother differed from me. the next day my brother drew a disc and i drew the sphere i saw.

in 2013 i had what i believe was a close encounter of the third kind. i saw a tall grey next to me in my bed. i noticed wrinkles and hair in the back of it's neck and when i ran it turned it's (stun wand thing) towards me. it was very thin and whitish and had the typical narrow black eyes like an ant. i put on my shoes since it was only a nap i woke from and saw a flash of blue from my bedroom window where it had gone through the wall when i went outside to see a craft. if it wanted to harm me it would have. it knew i was scared.  i woke up and was frightened the next day, but i was relieved it didn't pursue me that night.
content.summary: A sphere that turned from red, to orange to white with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 12 or 13 and i had a friend staying the night with me so we were up late just talking and watching movies. we had turned the tv and lights off in my room around 2 or 3 am and just talked for a little while. something prompted me to go to my window. i sat on my floor looking out my window, still in light conversation with my friend who was sitting on my bed about 3 ft away from me. as i gazed out my window across the street in my neighbors back pasture (about 50 yards from my house) which was a semi dense pine and palm tree area of about 3 acres i saw something rise above the trees in their pasture...As if it had been "parked" there and was now leaving. it slowly rose above the trees without making a single sound or disturbing the trees from where it was rising from. it hovered for a moment above the trees...Maybe 50 ft in the air (if that) and began to fly directly towards my house over the power lines and the street and the oak tree just to the right of my window. it moved rather slowly so i was able to tell that this was shaped like no other flying machine i had ever seen. it amazed me how silent it was...I knew that if it had been a small plane or helicopter i should have heard something or the trees should have been blowing, but nothing. it seemed to be a round shape maybe about 30-50 ft in diameter. this was a rural area so there were not many street lights or traffic lights to illuminate it well enough for me to make out specific characteristics about its color and shape. i could tell though by the arrangement of the lights on its exterior that it seemed to be like a flying saucer shape. it had many small lights on it that were many different colors. once it flew over my house i lost sight of it and had turned to my friend to ask her if she had just seen what i had just saw. she said that she had seen it and was just as perplexed as i was. in my state of confusion i did not think to leave my room and go outside to keep watching it....Honestly i was concerned that whatever it was might have seen me watching it. this is not the only time i have seen something in the sky i could not understand but it was definitely the first.
content.summary: Craft  rose into the sky and flew over my house

content.detailedDescription: Being in the balcony on a 25th floor watching over the byscaine bay in miami, from a building  in desing district, and then watch this really bright light that looks like an sphere came, stay static for a few seconds like somebody who wants to check the bulging out and then flu away really fast, making no sound stay for a few seconds static in the horizon and then  disappear...
content.summary: Bright light that came really close, stay static for a few seconds and then flu away really fast with not a noise

content.detailedDescription: Early one morning myself and two others had arrived to start work,i begain to unload the loader when i turned and saw this triangle object coming my way ,at that time i told the others to look,the object was moving straight at us,when the object got straight over our heads it stoped this is when we all seen[..The big secrect..]after 30 to 45 seconds the object begain to turn east from a head stop,like if you stuck a pencil in a toy plane and turned the plane pointing the nose north to east by turning the plane not the pencil...For 3 to 4 years man in black followed me...Sometime today when i less expect it i will turn and see them, the nature of the big secrect is why i want and need to be anonymous,others than 3 eye witnesses this was 1985 there was no cell phones and i had no camera[if anyone would like to know the big secect i have no problem with that,but if no than no harm done.Thx for the opportunity.:]
content.summary: Longated triangle,rounded corners,no sound, walking.Speed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the smoke pit outside the huts. when i decided to look up, i saw an object that camouflaged with the early morning dark sky; however, i was able to track it by seeing its outline. what i thought at the moment made me remember the scene from "close encounters of the third kind" where richard dreyfus (in his truck) is following the ufo's outline after he had its freaky light show experience. in full detail, the object flew across my position in a slow manner acting if it was conducting reconnaissance of the airfield. i lost sight when my attention was diverted to people in the vicinity. i looked up again and it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo flying over bagram airfield

content.detailedDescription: I got back from work around 17:30 on wed. 09/18/2013. we had severe storm/tornado weather that day. i started taking pictures of lightning and sky from my balcony on third floor of our condo. i was using digital canon t4. i took numerous pix and kept 5 of them (see attached).On 03/13/2014, i started looking trough all other pix including 5 pix from 09/18/2013. i am including all 5 photographs from that day (all pix were taken within 20-30 min). particular picture #4 shows white/silver/bright object in lower left corner above power lines/tree line in further distance. i have enlarged the photo and object is very bright silver/white, triangle/diamond shape. planes did not fly at that time due to severe weather. after doing more research object is right at o'hare int'l airport area (right at the radar location). i have lived in this area for over 16 years and can point out the exact location based on this picture. hopefully you have better equipment to investigate this picture in more detail and can shine more light on this. please let me know.
content.summary: Picture #4 from attached pix. lower left corner above the tree line white object.

content.detailedDescription: I just arrived at my house from the gym at exactly 8:33 pm, i had went outside to talk to my friend on the phone. i happen to look up over the power lines, and trees in the church yard into the sky to check out the stars while talking when the orange/reddish circle appeared, with the yellow light ring circling around it, hovering, at a stand still probably anywhere from 500-1,000 ft. at first i thought it was a helicopter because to be honest the neighborhood next to mine is pretty trashy, so i figured it was another police helicopter searching for another suspect, but that's when i realized..... there was absolutely no sound, and it was just sitting there, hovering with no spotlight, just an orange/redding circular shape with a yellow light that kept circling around the ball/sphere. it hovered, and was at a stand still for majority of the time, but then it moved up, and then down, to the right, and then up and down and to the right again, i knew it wasn't a plane because actually a plane flew by above it in the sky, and plus planes do not have three lights, in a triangle pattern underneath, and blink from left to right. i was in shock, and awe could not believe what i was seeing with my own very eyes, turned a skeptic into a believer within minutes. i was on the phone with my friend, and kept telling him "look above your house towards mine", but he could not see it because of trees, but did see the plane that flew above and by it. kept telling him "you have got to see this! i can not explain it!". i lost sight because after it went up, and down then to the right (slowly) the second time, it went to the right again (north) and slowly disintegrated, and vanished.... as if, someone slowly turned the lights off!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shock and awe

content.detailedDescription: Ufo filmed between arnprior and white lake ontario canada on nov 5th 2013 at approximately midnight.Coming back from ottawa heading home the owner of the film took the usual back road route.Noticing to his right was an unusual  bright flashing strobe beaming in plain view about 15 meters from his car.The object seemed to be be moving in the same direction he was going.Slowing down to observe the the light he came to stop.The object stopped aswell.He got out of the car to start filming it.The object appeared to to be at a standstill hovering soundlessly at about eye level directly 15 meters from where he was standing in the adjacent field.He said it seemed to observing him as he was observing it.After filming and taking several photographs he hopped back in his car and slowly proceeded to drive away only to notice it was following him.After driving about a quarter mile with the object traveling parallel to the right side of his car he then turned on to the nearest gravel road and witnessed the object veer across a corn field over the road then in behind a farm.He then stopped the car got out and heard what sounded like a huge sonic boom and immediately began to film again.Now filming the object hover over the farm,he noted that it seemed to have an usual interest in that general area.
content.summary: Strobing orbs in close proxiemty,photographed and filmed after being followed.Appeared to be observing the viewer.Close enough to throw a stone at.

content.detailedDescription: driving on i-40(going east)--my son brought my attention to them--ofos--objects(plural) were ahead of us(1/2) mile,moving twards us at about 200 feet alt.      they circled behind us and i got out my pistol(45 auto.). i pulled to the side of road and suddenl foun myself back on hwy.(stildriving). a trock appeared ahead(running lights on).. the ufos banked and went north           they banked as tho'an aircraft
content.summary: Light---if interested i will relate the rest please call

content.detailedDescription:
I am coming forward almost two years later to tell you my story. i am still in disbelief and worried. so here it goes.

i woke up at about 9:00 in the morning. at first there was nothing out of the usual. we were forecasted to have snow the night before but had gone to bed before it did. it was the next day. my husband asked me to go look out our bedroom window as i was getting out of bed to check and see if it had snowed overnight. i went to the window and all of a sudden i felt all the blood drain out of my face. my heart racing and in complete awe of what i was looking at, my husband asked, "well do you see any snow"? i didn't answer. then he asked again and i said get up you need to see this!!!!!!!! now!!!!!!!! he joined me at our bedroom window and looked down to the roof. it had snowed but what we saw with the snow appeared to be writing on our roof. it looked hyrogliphic in form and symbol. all of the impressions in the snow or the writing looked even in proportion to each other and spaced out with no evidence of anything around it. it was like it was stamped into the snow on our roof. it went from one end of the roof to the other. it was approximately 15 feet or better in length. we tried to rationalize what could have done this. was it an animal on the roof like a bird, squirrel or raccoon? there were no animal foot prints or tail prints. was it a joke being played on us by someone? but there were no ladder marks, handprints or foot prints. we decided to call up my brother and dad to come up stairs to see it. as at the time they were living with us. they came up and were in shock at what they were seeing. they were confused and tried to rationalize it from one end to the other only to come up with no explanation. i trust my husband, brother and dad. they are the most rational people i know. to see three men's facial expressions view the writing on our roof was of epic proportions to me. we were all alarmed and still can't figure out what did this to this day. when i kept looking at the writing on the roof i felt this isn't real. who did this. why? i had an overwhelming feeling we have been marked or chosen. before all of this i experienced some other unexplained phenomena and it still continues in and around our home.
content.summary: I witnessed symbols or writing on the roof of my home in the snow along with three other people.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back pourch and the street lights kept going out then i looked. up in the sky and it was weird
content.summary: Idk what it is

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back home with my fiance heading west when a bright light catches my attention, i thought it was a star at first. i looked down to maintain control of the car and when i look back up at the exact position of where i saw he light i saw it go from stationary to shooting across the sky heading north. i lost sight of the object due to the trees covering my view. my fiance saw it as well and pointed it out.

this is not the first object i've seen in the area.
content.summary: Star like light went from stationary/hovering then shot across the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was 16 years old and lived in the country outside of denver. one evening we went into town to get pizza and on the way back i saw a very bright light out in a field to the west. thinking it could be a downed plane ( there was a municipal airport nearby) my mom drove to the sight. i am the oldest of 5 and all of my siblings were present. we observed a very large ( 1/2 the size of a football field) cigar shaped craft hovering over the ground. it appeared to be metallic and had two very bright lights on the front and back. my mother turned off the car and rolled down the windows and it was silent except for a slight hum which could have been the power lines overhead. my mother and siblings have no recollection of how long we were there. strangely, even though i pointed the craft out and was older than the others, i have no memory of that night. i have retold the story always saying that it was something that happened to my mom and siblings. one day as an adult i asked my mom something about the event and she looked at me startled and said..."you were there, you were the one who pointed it out!" she found it odd i had no memory of that night. when i was twenty i wrote a paper for a college english class. it was an odd experience because i wrote this story very quickly and without having to think about it, afterwards i was somewhat surprised at what i had written. it is a story called "the precious harvest" and recounts the abduction of a young woman describing her examination and the explanation for the procedure being done on her. she was told that our species had been planted on this planet long ago and that the aliens believed that in a short period of time we would destroy the planet and ourselves with it. they described themselves as the guardians of seed responsible for making sure that our genetic material would be available to one day re-seed another planet. i am now 55 years old. i have been plagued by many unexplained events that many around me and at times myself, wrote off as "supernatural". my senior year of high school and first year of college i received phone calls from a woman who consistently told me where i had been and what i was doing, making it clear i was being closely watched. the event was reported to the police and persisted for a year and a half. it got so bad i had to have a police escort to nighttime events on campus. oddly, the woman would often say when i asked why she was doing this, "we love you as we have always loved you." i finally left school early and moved back east to live with my dad. the harassment stopped. however, i have since experienced what i thought was living in haunted houses. myself and my kids have had appliances turn on, furniture move, faucets turned on, lights turned on and off and many other odd occurances. when my son was ten he had an experience of something lifting his bed off of the floor, he was so frightened he could not call out for help, luckily his sister checked in on him and he flew off the bed and wrapped himself around her, still unable to speak. he never slept in that room again. my children and myself often wake with unexplained bruising and scratches. myself and my children have observed ufo's on multiple occasions and in different states.
content.summary: Encounter with a large ufo experienced by my entire family, but i am the only one who cannot remember what happened.

content.detailedDescription: On march 13th, 2014 at 11:10 pm my wife and i went outside in the backyard of our west side home.  looking up at the sky my wife pointed out a light slightly south of where we were.  it was a solid light, slightly brighter than the other stars in the sky.  it was partially cloudy that night.  the light was at an elevation higher than the clouds and looked totally solid at the distance. it also moved faster than any commercial aircraft.  about 30 seconds after that we saw another one followed by 7 more all flying in a straight line but spaced out, not very close.  they moved very slowly changing direction from north to west and back several times.  8 minutes after spotting the first light we saw and could faintly hear a jet at the same high altitude approaching.  the lights split formation and went separate directions, except for the one closet to the jet stopped and then went back and fourth in an east to west and back manner as if taunting the approaching jet.  as the jet got almost to the distance of the lights when they were in formation, the last light left at a high rate of speed in a northwest direction.  within seconds it was out of sight as cloud cover was also increasing.  the jet changed direction, west, then behind cloud cover.  after that, we lost sight of all moving objects.  several times for a few seconds at a time we lost sight of the lights from passing clouds.  we tried capturing the objects on video but the distance and altitude combined with darkness and iphone auto-focus nothing worth viewing.
content.summary: 5-10 light, in formation, then split when jet approached

content.detailedDescription:
Myself & three other men were riding in a jeep on our way to san antonio
from poteet, texas, and the jeep had no roof, so that i was able to see the stars, because the skies were clear! i saw an object moving at a rate
of speed more excessive than i have ever seen before! it was outside the earth's atmosphere, where the stars reside! when it took a right turn without slowing down & without any curvature from the direction it had been
going, i knew without a shadow of a doubt, that i had seen a ufo! i now have no doubts in my mind that alien life forms exist! the men who were riding in the jeep with me did not see the object, even though i was screaming with excitement when i saw it make the abrupt turn! i get ridiculed every time i tell anyone about my sighting! but, i will not be able to change my beliefs, because i saw it with my own eyes, and i was not on drugs or alcohol!
content.summary: Saw object streaking thru night sky & take abrupt right turn without reducing speed

content.detailedDescription: My experience was about 18 years ago. i was 11. it was dusk and i was fishing with my father and a friend of his and saw a bright light similar to a star moving in the horizon making maneuvers that modern aircraft are unable to make. at first i thought that it was a bright star, but the longer i watched it began to sway back and forth on the horizon. i pointed it out to my father who saw it sway from side to side. it then abruptly stopped and accelerated toward us. we then rowed the john boat to shore to get the binoculars in the truck. by the time we got the binoculars the object was overhead above the trees. it then disappeared before we were able to find it with the binoculars. the object made no noise as it approached. throughout the entire experience i was excited because i was observing something that i had never seen before and was curious about what could be maneuvering like that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared as a star, but made direction change unlike anything observed

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home in the bed and sleeping pretty soundly.
there was a light and then extreme darkness in a large cold room.
the second and third time i knew exactly what it was the first time i was at a loss like "where am i?"
the most vivid experience is me laying on a table with an amber colored gel on my stomach. the amber turned glass like made my skin taut and i lost consciousness. when i woke up again there was a female looking person with very specific characteristics i was presented with an infant that looked exactly like me except with characteristics like the female. there were more in tubes. she was seemingly pleased and we have met before (not sure how i know). she told me very specific things about science, alien life etc. i often see hovering craft now concealed in cloud cover.
content.summary: I was taken several times and witnessed a hybrid dna experience & unbelievable communication and learning experiences

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object the first time 3/7/2014, also on 3/12 and 3/13. the first time i was around a campfire with friends on the illinois river, northeast of tahlequah, ok.  then in ft. gibson, ok and last night in muskogee, ok.  each time the light was in the same place:overhead, a little west of orion. last night i was on the phone with a friend in okay, ok who also could see the light.  from his vantage point the light was as i was observing: just west of orion and nearly directly overhead.  with the same apparent location in the sky when seen from various locations, i think the light must have been quite high. six other people saw the same thing i was seeing: the star like light at times moving in a straight line, it also was stationary for maybe 20 seconds and then moved again. sometimes in a curving motion, or circular motion; often making 90 degree turns.  it never strayed beyond a rather small area in its activity.  how small? a large extended hand would delineate the area i saw it in, during the three nights that i watched it. it compared in brightness to a bright star, there was no problem in locating it.  the brightest light overhead was this object, whatever the heck it was!
content.summary: Star like light observed overhead west of orion. at times it moved straight but also many turns, stop and go. seen 3 nights in a week

content.detailedDescription: I never reported this because i was certain others would.  was surprised when i heard nothing about it.  however today when reviewing the last 20 sightings posted on this website i noticed one from alton, illinois describing objects similar to the one i saw in alton a little over a year ago.  i observed the object from my top floor office in an office building at the highest point in downtown alton. the view looks out over the mississippi river which is just a couple of blocks away. this was in the afternoon, slightly overcast and not in any way dark, hazy or foggy. solid white non-reflective oval object hovering at a tilt over the river. after watching it for about 5 minutes i asked my assistant to come take a look. she was as perplexed as i was as we took turns looking at it through a cheap pair of binoculars.  we both moved to a different office where high-powered binoculars are mounted on a tripod, and observed it for another 10 minutes. it was only slightly higher than our own elevation and although not directly across from us, it was easy to observe.  after hovering, it very slowly moved to the west above the river until slightly moving to the north over land and out of our view. alton is located near a small regional airport where private jets and small prop planes are in and out all of the time. there is an international airport 25 miles away in st. louis, missouri.  in addition, boeing builds and tests military aircraft next to the international airport.  about 40 miles south and east is scott air force base.  i point this out to emphasize we see all types of aircraft in the skies above alton and what i saw is nothing like anything seen from any of those sources.
content.summary: Object hovered above river then slowly moved west over river and gradually over land and out of sight. moved slowly the entire time.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 3pm, february 28 2014. me and my girlfriend were flying out of montreal on our way to dominican republic when i spotted a strange ufo or anomaly in the distance. we must of been over new york at the time. i noticed it through the plane window for awhile so i decided to film it on my galaxy note 2 phone. i couldn't catch it at first because it was alitle far, plus the plane window was pretty dirty so it was hard to find. but once i found it, it started to shift, then just take off! it disapeared. glad i caught it! i'm not a video person so the video is unedited, as is.

video here.
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ufo sighting from plane flying over the us during the day

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on meadowlark rd and had pulled over to wait on a friend on a dirt road. a "star" to the west caught my attention. the object then moved north in a straight line sped up then abruply stopped. object then proceeded south at a moderate speed moving up & down. the object was best guess, 1 1/2 to 2 miles away. the object then stopped & disappeared. there was no further activity.
content.summary: Craft moved north then abruply moved south. moved up & down when moving south. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Triangle shaped ufo with bright red flashing lights,flashing with a distinct pattern and with an extreme brightness unlike planes or other aircraft that use the nearby flight path. the object was first fying straight up from the horizon then with a sharp 90 degree change of flight direction it moved off over the roof tops where i was able to make a better note of the intensity of the flashing lights and of the pattern of flashes between the 3 lights... after about 3-6 minuets the object flew off into the distance.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo with bright red lights fying stright up from horizon then with a sharp 90 degree change of flight  direction it moved off over the houses and into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on the walkway and noticed a bright flashing object flying at a fast rate thinking it was a jet or satellite i waited continued watching it all the sudden it took a hard left and started heading south it went a few 100 yrds and changed its flight path again to south east about 500 yards out it stopped and hovered over a land area keeping my eye on it. its sat in that position for around 2 min then moved on south east until it phased out of sight 6:15 am friday march 14th 20014. i felt nothing i have seen some activity around the area before.
content.summary: South east bound object

content.detailedDescription: 6:03am chevron shaped craft flew over barn. under radar definitely.  orange glow lit up solid from tip to tip. seemed to speed up out of sight to ne in less than 6 sec. no sounds. was waiting for some kind of sound. nothing.
content.summary: Past usaf. always looking up. not 1st 1. craft large silent no safety lights. orange red glow brilliant solid light from wing to wing.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cigar shaped craft hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes, my teacher shouted at me  to pay attention and when i got the nerve to look back it had gone, but what grabbed my attention was it looked like one of my dads cigar cases. i have been thinking about this sighting for the last 44 years and it is obvious to men that these crafts have to be under the sea or on the moon i would guess these are under our oceans, if you do the figures and the number of sightings every year they have to be here and if they are under our oceans is the only place or the artic. all i can say is this i know beyond any doubt they they exist i have known for 44 years so all you need to do now is find them they are here, what bothers me also is the amount of people who go missing every year yet the governments keep it very quiet. hey good luck and at least you have an interesting task which is more than most people.

very best regards

mike
content.summary: It was a cigar shaped craft hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a child (under the age of ten) on multiple occasions, something happened to me. my parents used to find me in a daze screaming and crying and unable to speak clearly. i was taken to the doctor and my parents were told that i was having "night terrors"... 
   what i recollect about these event is that i wasnt crying because of a bad dream i was crying because i felt so overwhelmed by my inability to put into words what i felt... now as i think back the way i xan describe it is "frighteningly vast" as if standing next to a topless skyacraper in a bottomless pit.... what i remember are opaque translucent orbs about 8 to 10 inches floating in my room and down the hallway.... i rememeber my ears ringing like a gun had went off next to my head and this weird visual in my mind of like a line with dashes on it sort of like a ruler and the feeling of my awareness jumping skipping a few dashes landing and jumping againg down the line... the orbs had colors to them maybe they pulsed they were lit up in the dark but did not admit aany light or brighten the area around them.... these visits would happen when i was sleeping and i always remember straining incredibly hard and fighting to wake up as if something was physically keeping me down. for some reason when this would happen i would wake up o  a bare mattras sheets and pillows and blankets all heaped neatly in a pile by my door.. the orbs would be in my room or id see them outside my door in the hallway... the feeling at that age was not one if fear ir terror... it was one of being overwhelmed beyond the capability of my words... i can not say for certain if i ever left my room but on seperate occasions as an adult i have felt myself being slipped into bed and the temperature difference between my cold body and my girlfriends warm body woke us both up... same ringing in ears, same feeling of my cognitive awareness bounding down a line of measurement or something of that nature... same sickeningly overwhelmed feeling of how small we are... when we woke up she was curious as to where id been... because my side of the bed was cold as well as my unclothed body... i didnt have an answer just as when id wake my parents up crying... and tears came as an adult as well... when i went to get a drink of water i noticed the front door at the bottom of the stairs was open woke my girlfriend up fully we checked on her daughter and all the upstairs rooms then went and closed the door and checked the downstairs... where it was very cold so obviously the door had been open for some time... i know for a fact that when we went to sleep the front door was closed and locked both handle and bolt because or neighborhood wasnt the best.... im not sure if this is an abduction or visitation, there is a smell that i always have in my sweat after these events and i cant place it... if this is happening to anyone else please contact me with details...
content.summary: Translucent floating orbs in home

content.detailedDescription: I started filming these things last week.  they are up there every night and as long as you can see stars they're there
content.summary: Saw the lights and started filming

content.detailedDescription: I'm 61 yrs. old. i've always been interested in military aitcraft. i've watched a b-58 hustler hovering about 20 feet over some trees; for maybe six to eight seconds. i was maybe a hundred yards away. the b-58 hustler does not hover. i've seen a ufo flying from east to west, covering an estimated distance of 20 miles; in about eight seconds. it seemed to be anywhere from 500 to 1,000 feet long. it bounced up and down as it crossed the sky. it bounced up and down in the sky, like an a/c current sine wave. from peak to peak of its bounce, i'd say was maybe half a mile. and i saw one ufo that looked basically like a navy f-14 tomcat with its wings folded for super-sonic flight. the similarity ended at where the engine intakes are on an f-14. it was like an f-14 without a cockpit; ascending and reflecting sunlight so much it almost hurt my eyes to look at it. so over the years, i've seen a few different ufos. if they are ours, the government is keeping them secret from us. if you would like to contact me, well, you have my address and e-mail address, [email removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One was shaped like a 55 gallon oil drum.

content.detailedDescription: While camping alone on the cliffs of gay head, aquinnah, martha's vineyard, massachusetts i made this observation.  it waa bill clinton's birthday, as mine was the day before, so i guess we were both celebrating on the island...My accommodations were a bit more primitive than his i'd guess.  to save money i drove my motorcycle to a secluded spot on gay head cliff, looking out to no man's island, an uninhabited island that had been used by the military for bombing practice, about a mile off shore. it was very dark, but a nice starry night.  i had passed clinton's motorcade earlier that day and was just enjoying the solitude and peace of that beautiful island.  the beach front lay before me at the bottom of the cliff; a clothing optional beach, very famous, was nearby and got extensive use on sunny summer days.  the president had done a book signing that day in vineyard haven and may have been coming back from the beach when i saw his motorcade.  it was late,about 1am,  when i finally settled down, as i wanted to be as inconspicuous as possible; camping was illegal there. i  had only a sleeping bag, which was enough for that nice weather.  as i was looking out over the cliff to the sw i saw a fishing boat way off, a dragger, with all its very bright lights on, not moving so it seemed.  suddenly, to the right of the boat appeared a large, spinning, pinwheel kind of light, with reds, oranges, and yellows going round and round, going clockwise.  it was just at the ocean surface and not far from the boat..I thought, those guys on the boat have to be looking at this light.  it was kind of freaky watching, trying to figure out what it could be.  it was not related to the boat at all.  i watched it stay steady for about ten minutes when all of a sudden it just went out, like someone pulled a light switch...Just gone.  the boat was still in the same spot.  i wondered whether it was still there with its light out or moving in the darkness with out lights.  i kept watching but never saw the light again..I didn't sleep much that night, wondering if it might find me there alone, miles from the nearest habitation. just a weird and lucky observation for me.  i wonder what the boat crew thought.  i'd say the pinwheel was almost the size of the ship and that they were very near each other, relative to my position.  was it observing the boat?  i don't know.
content.summary: Large, rotating, orange-red pinwheel type circle on ocean surface
